data.name: Diluvian Winds
data.detailed_description:
GET A BETA KEY


Wishlist more city builder from Goblinz!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989070/Synergy/


WISHLIST THE PROLOGUE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1843430/Diluvian_Winds_Prologue/


About the Game


Diluvian is a 2D management/adventure game seen from the side in semi-real time, in a context of exile due to the rising waters. The player embodies the Guardian, an individual who, refusing to leave his lighthouse, will witness this mass exodus.

Expand your Community by Floating, Flying or even Submerging

Each Lodged Refugee will make changes of varying magnitude around the Lighthouse, making it more resilient to the gradually rising waters.


Enter a poetic universe combining Sail Punk architecture and Anthropomorphism

In order to survive, the Keeper will have to choose whether or not to house nearby Travelers in need of help.


Experience countless stories with procedurally generated events and characters

Different Survival Paths will be open to the Keeper to adapt his Lighthouse to withstand the flood.

data.short_description: Diluvian Winds is a building and management game in a context of exile due to the rising waters. Survive as you expand your community in your lighthouse.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
